Package net.xqhs.flash.core.agent

Class AgentEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xqhs.util.config.Config
      • net.xqhs.flash.core.util.MultiValueMap
        • net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.AgentEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentWave
    public class AgentEvent
extends MultiValueMap
    The class models an agent event, characterized by its type and, optionally, a set of parameters that have names.

    The class is backed by a MultiValueMap.

    There are several predefined types of agent events, as seen in AgentEvent.AgentEventType.

    Author:
    andreiolaru
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  AgentEvent.AgentEventHandler
      The interface should be implemented by a class that can handle agent events for an agent component.
      static class  AgentEvent.AgentEventType
      The enumeration specified the full set of agent-internal events that can occur.
      static class  AgentEvent.AgentSequenceType
      The sequence type of an agent event specifies the order in which components should be notified of the event.
